mapper.select: select t.id, t.train_number, t.is_return, t.type, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.shift, s1.site_name as startName, s2.site_name as endName, t.time_consume, t.carriage, t.train_status from t_train t left join t_site s1 on t.start_id = s1.id left join t_site s2 on t.end_id = s2.id

select t.id, t.train_number, t.start_time, t.time_consume from t_train t left join t_site s1 on t.start_id = s1.id left join t_site s2 on t.end_id = s2.id where t.train_status=1 and t.id in
#{id}
